about_the_game:
Superpersons University is a comedy adventure deckbuilder game where 2 superpersons compete for a date with another superperson at the university.

Choose one of The Superpersons and play against the computer or online against another player.

Play your cards right to impress your love interest and win a date, but don't get stuck in the "friend zone." Your archenemy will play any card to prevent you from getting the date.

But there's a twist. You don't know who your adversary is. You need to pass notes (cards) to the other superpersons to discover who likes who. That's what people do in university. Only then, can you defeat your opponent.

There's more strategy than it seems.

The cards are made with official "college ruled" paper for an authentic college experience.

It's exactly like going to college again. It's the fun of college without the annoying learning and effort.

The Superpersons


Buff Bodysuit



Hunky Jorts



Kitty Costume



Red Undies



Snazzy Vest



Swimsuit Ninja

Superpersons University is a comedy adventure deckbuilder game where 2 superpersons compete for a date with another superperson at the university.

Choose one of The Superpersons and play against the computer or online against another player.

Play your cards right to impress your love interest and win a date, but don't get stuck in the "friend zone." Your archenemy will play any card to prevent you from getting the date.

But there's a twist. You don't know who your adversary is. You need to pass notes (cards) to the other superpersons to discover who likes who. That's what people do in university. Only then, can you defeat your opponent.

There's more strategy than it seems.

The cards are made with official "college ruled" paper for an authentic college experience.

name: Superpersons University

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 with SP1
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card

short_description: The game to end all games. Superpersons University is a comedy deckbuilder game. Compete with one of the Superpersons to get a date with another Superperson, but you don't know who the other suitor is. Discover your nemesis, foil their plans, and get the date. (This is not an erotic game.)
